docs.snippet: Salvatore Baccaloni, Metropolitan Opera basso comique who made his New York debut last season, arrived yesterday on the American Republics liner Uruguay from engagements in South American cities with Bruno Landi, Metropolitan tenor.

docs.snippet: Members of the Museum of Modern Art, 11 West Fifty-third Street, had a preview last night of the new furniture and furnishings that have resulted from the inter-American design competition held by the museum's department of industrial design.

docs.snippet: SANTIAGO, Chile, Sept. 25 (AP) -- The Socialist newspaper Critica charged today that the plot uncovered this week in Argentina was a Nazi conspiracy involving a military attack on Chile designed to prevent unity in the Americas.
docs.lead_paragraph: SANTIAGO, Chile, Sept. 25 (AP) -- The Socialist newspaper Critica charged today that the plot uncovered this week in Argentina was a Nazi conspiracy involving a military attack on Chile designed to prevent unity in the Americas.

docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, Sept. 25 -- Three hundred additions were made to the blacklist of Latin-American concerns and individuals believed to be acting in the interest of Germany and Italy in a supplemental list issued tonight by Secretary of State Cordell Hull.

docs.snippet: Good neighbors tugging at the wheels of production are about to challenge shoppers grown listless with curtailed manufacture of consumer material and dwindling supplies from the hapless doors of European exporters. Within a few weeks stores...
docs.lead_paragraph: Good neighbors tugging at the wheels of production are about to challenge shoppers grown listless with curtailed manufacture of consumer material and dwindling supplies from the hapless doors of European exporters. Within a few weeks stores throughout the country will radiate a warm aura of Latin-American colors, with articles both strange and familiar attesting to the fact that this program is settling down to a mutually beneficial neighborliness.

headline.main: Novel Latin-American Products Will Be Sold In This Country; With European Markets Shut Off, Good-Neighbor Policy Offers Profitable Channel for Exports

docs.snippet: BUENOS AIRES, Argentina, Sept. 27 -- Minister of War General Juan N. Tonazzi gave clear proof of his determination to stamp out the last traces of disaffection in the army flying service when today he ordered Major Martin Cairo, described as the...
docs.lead_paragraph: BUENOS AIRES, Argentina, Sept. 27 -- Minister of War General Juan N. Tonazzi gave clear proof of his determination to stamp out the last traces of disaffection in the army flying service when today he ordered Major Martin Cairo, described as the leader of the dissatisfied group of officers in the Military Aviation School at Cordoba, to report immediately and in person at the Ministry of War.

docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, Oct. 3 -- Exports of merchandise from the United States in July amounted to $354,649,000, compared with $316,669,000 in the same month last year, the Department of Commerce reported today in revised statistics based on geographical areas.
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Oct. 3 -- Exports of merchandise from the United States in July amounted to $354,649,000, compared with $316,669,000 in the same month last year, the Department of Commerce reported today in revised statistics based on geographical areas.
